enumtype.name: org.rapidbeans.rapidenv.config.PropertyValueType
enumtype.description: Determines the type of a property's values.

enum.name: string
enum.description: A string of nearly arbitrary length only limited be the OS.

enum.name: file
enum.description: A (path to a) local file or directory.

enum.name: path
enum.description: A set of many paths to a local file like the OS command path or the Java class path.

enum.name: url
enum.description: A path to a remote resource.
